page.title: 06LIFESTYLES A CHILDS DAY 1985
page.content: I wake up on my farm at 7.30 a.m.I get dressed and go outside to feed my three ducks.Then I have my breakfast.I usually have a bowl of cereal with milk.I then get ready for school,pack my bag and leave home at 8.30.My mother takes me 2 and a half miles to school in her small mini car.School begins at 9 a.m we work until 12 a.m with a short break to play at 10.45 a.m.At 12.00 we walk down to the village institute to have our lunch.Lunch is cooked in the institute.When we have all finished we return to school.Afternoon school begins at 1.15 p.m and continues until 3.30 p.m.I usually go home in a school taxi.This takes ten children home along the very narrow winding lanes.When I get home I usually watch television until 6 p.m when I have supper.
